channel.title: R shiny apps on CSV SOLUTIONS
channel.description: Recent content in R shiny apps on CSV SOLUTIONS

item.title: Data Science training
item.description:
Data Science is a mix of various tools, predictive algorithms, and machine learning principles with a main goal to discover unveil pattern and insights from data. We are offering training from 15th March 2021 to end of March 2021. Fill the form that follows to register.
Please submit the form after completion.

item.title: Work
item.description: Our data analysis projects, training, dashboards and R shiny apps projects are here. Feel free to learn and apply to open training programs and courses.
